about_the_game:
I’m no hero. I’m just a guy, running for his life. I’m not even a cop. I stole this car while they ate his face.
If you’re listening to this I’m long gone. Either I made it to the boat my wife never knew I owned, or I never got there. Either way, the car’s all yours now. The tank’s full of gas and the fender’s tougher than they are. So enjoy the ride. And keep moving south. I hear they hate the water.

We Can’t Get Through The Zombies is a 1970s cop movie based a day before the zombie apocalypse.

Features:
Police Car
Zombies
More Zombies
detailed_description:
I’m no hero. I’m just a guy, running for his life. I’m not even a cop. I stole this car while they ate his face.
If you’re listening to this I’m long gone. Either I made it to the boat my wife never knew I owned, or I never got there. Either way, the car’s all yours now. The tank’s full of gas and the fender’s tougher than they are. So enjoy the ride. And keep moving south. I hear they hate the water.

We Can’t Get Through The Zombies is a 1970s cop movie based a day before the zombie apocalypse.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: system

name: We can't get through the zombies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: system

short_description: It's not the end of the world. It's the day before. The zombies are almost everywhere now, so get to that boat you lied to your wife about not owning. Use any means necessary to get there, because it's your last hope. Let's rock and roll hero. It's time.
